It concatenates incoming chunks into a string `potential_object`. It obtains a partial model via `cls.get_partial_model()`. Then validates the object against the partial model using `model_validate`. Then yields the validated model.

Thus the business logic: incremental parsing of streaming JSON data, building partial Pydantic models as data arrives, supporting partial parsing modes.
